#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    int n;
    int a[101];
    vector<int> v;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int i;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            scanf("%d",a+i);
        for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
            v.push_back(*(a+i));
        int idx=max_element(v.begin(),v.end())-v.begin();
        idx=n-idx;
        printf("%d\n",idx);
        v.clear();
    }
    return 0;
}
